full_threads.body: @andy Yep, I've added it to jamie's dashboard.

Hey Manual + Joel.

Can you confirm that Apexa was added to Joel's dashboard in Kinsta?

Ty

Hi Jamie,

Of course - we'll get that added now.

Also, do you use Slack?

If you're open to it, it would be great to create a shared Dalligator
channel with a few of our core team members (Joel, Rika etc.) to ensure we
get back to you quickly and keep growing the relationship.

All good if email is best for you too.

Thanks,
Andy
